algorithm_technique: Depth-First Search (DFS) with recursion to check for a root-to-leaf path sum.
problem_summary_simple: Check if any root-to-leaf path in a binary tree sums up to a target value.
problem_summary_technical: Recursively traverses the binary tree, subtracting node values from the target sum, and checks for a leaf node matching the remaining sum.
key_insights: The problem requires checking root-to-leaf paths specifically.
Recursion is a natural fit for tree traversal, with the sum being updated at each step.
Base cases are crucial: an empty tree and reaching a leaf node.
